article_title: Chen: Obamacare Outlook Goes From Poor to Critical
article_text:
'A Streetcar Named Desire': Charlie Rose

14:37 - On "Charlie Rose," a conversation anout the play "A Streetcar Named Desire." It transports the play to the 21st century and finds the cast performing on a transparent, revolving set. The New York Times calls this version "a wounding portrait of communal loss." The Show runs until June 4th at Brooklyn's St. Ann's Warehouse. We are joined by the cast of the show. Gillian Anderson plays Blanche DuBois, Ben Foster plays Stanley Kowalski, and Vanessa Kirby who plays Stella. (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: June 27 (Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg's Lanhee Chen discusses the Wall Street Journal's findings on the Affordable Care Act. He speaks with Matt Miller on "Bottom Line." (Source: Bloomberg)

It transports the play to the 21st century and finds the cast performing on a transparent, revolving set.
Gillian Anderson plays Blanche DuBois, Ben Foster plays Stanley Kowalski, and Vanessa Kirby who plays Stella.
The New York Times calls this version "a wounding portrait of communal loss."
The Show runs until June 4th at Brooklyn's St. Ann's Warehouse.
